content.detailedDescription: I was a very avid coon hunter during my teenage years.  my friends and i went with an older man and his buddy who could holler real loud to get us out the woods when we went to a tree to get the coon.  the older man owned a couple of real good coon dogs that we hunted with.  buck and sally were the dogs names.  we always hunted at night.  the older men, mr. maxie and bobby have been deceased for years now.  this experience happened in the winter of 1964 or 1965.  i was 16 or 17 years old.  two of us went with mr. maxie and bobby that night.  the other guy lives around 25 miles from me now.  we went to a place we called the blowup a few miles from turbeville off hwy. 378.  we drove around behind a house to the edge of the woods where we stopped and built a fire for mr. maxie and bobby to stay warm and let the dogs out to hunt.  we usually went hunting around 7:00 pm or a little later.  after a while we heard the dogs on a trail and listened to them for a little while.  mr. maxie told us to go on in the woods and the dogs would be treed by the time we got to them.  the two of us got our flashlights and the rifle and left out to go to the dogs.  these dogs were very good and there was always something in the tree or had been in the tree if they treed.  most of the time, it was a coon, but ocassionly they would tree a possum or a wildcat.  the blowup was were a dam used to be that had been blown up with dynamite sometime in the past.  we made our way through the woods down what i call some old cow trails to the blowup.  the water was not very high and we crossed the blowup to the other side.  the dogs were still trailing at this time.  we made our way on through the woods following the dogs barking.  we finally came out the woods on the other side to an open field with a line of trees going out to our left and the woods extending on out to our right where the dogs had treed.  we followed this line of trees to our left for maybe two or three hundred yards.  the dogs were over to our right.  we were still on a trail.  we started to cross over to where the dogs were treed when they just quit barking.  we were puzzled as to why this had happened because it rarely happened with these dogs.  we were standing there beside this line of trees to our left when i spotted some discs over the field on the other side of this line of trees.  we walked closer to the tree line and looked up at the discs flying around up there at incredible speeds making impossible manuvers that aircraft today cannot think about doing.  the discs were well lite up with white light as best as i can remember.  they were a few hundred yards out over the field and probably around 300 to 500 feet up in the air. as best as i can remember, they were a little bigger than a big car in a disc shape.  we were dumbfounded at this sight.  we really didn't know how to react or what to do since we knew we were observing flying saucers.  as best as i can remember we watched them for around five or ten minutes and decided about the same time we needed to get out of there.  i had the feeling they knew we were there.  i remember leaving to get back to the fire and things are very fuzzy after that.  this was not a huge woods to get lost in and we were very experienced at going in the woods at night and coming back out. we were probably only 20 or 30 minutes walk from the starting point at the fire.  for some unknown reason we could not get out of those woods and find our way back to the the fire for three or four hours.  i don't remember hearing bobby holler or the car horn blowing during this time.  we were confused and could not get out the woods.  this is mostly lost time to both of us trying to get out the woods.  we finally got back to the fire.  mr. maxie and bobby said they were about ready to go get a search party to come find us if we hadn't come out when we did. we kept this experience to ourselves for years because we were afraid they might put us in the state hospital for crazy people if we told anybody.  i don't know about my friend, but i have never had any dreams or thoughts about being abducted and i don't think we were.  it just seems something confused us and  we were not able to find our way out the woods for those hours.  this is my only encounter with ufos in my life. one thing that is different from many other sightings i have seen in programs on tv is that they did something to our minds to confuse us for a few hours.  i know they are real and people will still look at me funny when i tell them this story. it happened and they are real.
content.summary: Three to five brightly lite up discs flying around each other over a field as if playing  a game or just having fun flying.

content.detailedDescription:
I believe it was just before christmas. it would have been in the mid 1970's. i was born in 1966, this happened when i was around 8-10 yrs old.
 my brother in law was driving his wife (my sister who was 20 when i was born) and myself to sharon pa. we were headed to a department store to go shopping. i was in the back seat looking out the right side window and saw some lights and a craft just over the trees about 2 tenths of a mile away. (at that age i had no idea about acceptable flight heights of crafts to really know that it shouldnt have been permitted to fly that low.) i didnt want to be laughed at by saying look a ufo, but as it got a little closer it was obious it wasnt a plane. i said look a ufo!!! at first they chuckled and said yea uhuh, 10 seconds later they were agreeing with me! the entire sighting didnt last over 3 minutes.
 i have watched ufo shows for a long time and have never heard my craft explained, nor do i think your choices on this page covers it either, thats why i checked other. the craft was shaped like a pool table, it was about 40 feet long by 20 feet wide it was 10 feet high. had 6 lights on the bottom, where the pockets would be on a pool table. the craft was black, metal looking, it flew long ways, it had a window in the side of the craft that went top to bottom. there was a control panel visible but no one was seen in the window. 
   the craft flew across the highway just in front of our car and stopped over a trailer park that was right beside the highway. it tilted down over a trsiler and the bottom was 10 to 15 feet from the top of the trailer. 
 i remember that it was just getting dark and there were many headlights coming west and anybody driving would have seen it but as i recall nobody pulled over or stopped, neither did we! i couldnt believe my brother in law kept driving!! but he did. 
 i watched it from the right side, to flying in front of us and watching out the back window as we kept driving. i saw all sides of the craft.
 i am guessing on the year, i was a child, but i do know it was in the mid 70's. 
 has anyone ever described a craft such as this? or reported on this same encounter?
 my sister has since passed away. when i was in my early 20's i stopped to see my brother in law to ask him about that night. all he remembered was lights in the sky. i was greatly dissapointed, i had hoped he would have recalled some of the details. 
i am not a good artist but i would be happy to describe it to an artist and share it with your agency.
  the movements of the craft was in a straight line just as an airplane would fly, there was no up down just a straight flight path to the top of the trailer. our viewing ended as we continued driving the craft was still above the trailer as we left the viewing range.
 when i was older i drove down that road again to see what i remembered, and sure enough, there was still a trailer park right next to the highway.
 if you may recall, there was a famous ufo encounter back in 2007 i believe in girard ohio when a policeman had a sighting and chased a craft till his car died. mt sighting was on the outskirts of that town, roughly 5 air miles from his sighting.
content.summary: A pool table shaped craft flew just above the tree tops in front of our car.

content.detailedDescription: The photo is a picture message sent to my husband on his cell from a co-worker's son who was working on a train somewhere in the mojave desert.
content.summary: It was witnessed by my husband's coworker's son.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside of my house, sitting on the side wall of my staircase. i heard a humming noice, low pitched, vibrating in deep frequency. i looked up and saw an oval disc the size of a football field, metallic sage greenish-gray, with 3 beams of light descending downward onto my neighbors apartment building. i knew immediately it was an ufo because this was not my first sighting. it was a coastal foggy, cloudy night. the craft hovered across street from my home for approximately 1 minute. then the craft rotated very slowly in a circular motion, as the 3 beams of light jetted down. then the craft moved in a sliding motion side ways, and speeded off (less than a second in time) upward, out of sight. i called the santa monica airport and lax to ask if someone saw what i saw. i called information and received a number and made a report. i was sent a form and was shocked to discover the questions as i knew someone or group had to have seen a similar sighting in order to ask and set up the questionaire as it was written. at first i was stunned, then afraid, then driven to tell my sighting to someone who would believe me.
content.summary: Craft hovering in a circular motion, light beaming downward, flying away

content.detailedDescription: I was around 11 years old and i was getting ready to leave my friends house to walk home. it was about to be dark this was around summer so around 8:30 pm. i rember out of the corner of my eye i saw something coming that appeared at first to be a shooting star, but when i looked it was bright gold color almost looking like a gold stud earing, and it was lower than the clouds and coming fast. i rember it was fully lit and then all the sudden it started going dark and then back on like cutting its self off and back on and it was traveling really fast like it was running from something. it never made a sound either it was quiet but fast and i remember thinking it should be loud like a jet or something but no sound, and i remember it lifted up a little in the sky and hit a real speed boost and then went off and i couldnt see it nomore, and it was about not even a minute after that three apache helecopters in what i know now in a fighting formation appeared where i first saw the gold ball appear. they were just above the trees and had real bright lights shining down on the ground as if they were searching for something, and i remember they keep going around the same area and finally they went dark but i could still hear them, and i remember getting scared and running home. i told my mom but of course i was a kid at the time and she thinks i am making it up. i remember about maybe 4 years later i watched this movie i cant remember the name of it but it was based on a true story, and thats when it dawned on me everything that happened the way i seen it was what happened in this movie, it was wear a ufo apperad over this house abuducted this person, and the military picked up on it and try to get to it, and the whole apache helicopters showed up to the seen and everything and i remember getting cold chills from it. i have told friends and stuff over the years but this is the first time i have ever reported it. i think my brother seen it to he may have been with me, i can never forget what i seen all the years later its like it happened yesterday, and the ufo didnt have a bunch of lights on it it was just bright gold no other lights and was traveling 2 to 3 times faster than fighter jets you see flying around. i almost think that something happened to someone around there maybe an abduction, and the military was trying to cover it up i dont know. i am willing to take any kind of lie ditector test anything to prove what i seen and show i am telling the truth and i believe if you were to investigate you may find other people or even the person that may have experienced it. i am a sketchy person so it has to be in my face to believe it, and this happened.
content.summary: Gold ball flashing and military apaches

content.detailedDescription: I worked 2nd shift,til midnight,after work i or we would get a 6 pack of beer & ride around to unwind or go park somewhere & sit . so this night we went to the top of the highest point in the area & sat & talked about work,etc.& we were enjoying the view of the country around us,had just opened the 1st beer,when my friend ernie said ,do you see that bright light over towards new freedom.I sure did,it was very very bright & shiney.It was hovering with a slight motion going to & fro. we watched it a good while,ernie says i really don't think thats a helicopter or airplane,i totally agreed. then it shined a bright beam of light towards the earth,we watched in disbelief,after a few minutes we noticed something being brought up into the craft.I was so scared but kept watching.We said very little.It just hovered there for quite awhile.Then what or whoever they brought into the craft was being lowered back down.With the bright beam,then after that there was a bright beam coming from the earth towards the craft & then it stopped.We sat there & watched a little longer then the craft started moving southward. i had a willy's jeep with the top off.It was still pretty warm then.We decided to try to follow it.We got to the bottom of the hill & tore up the road & caught up with it in our sight.We followed it into the state of maryland,baltimore county.We followed it to the prettyboy resivior.It stopped again for a minute & then it was gone,it took off in a flash.Gone !!! ernie said to me,i don't think you should tell anybody about what we saw,they'll never believe us.I never did tell anyone til years later.But i remember it like it was testerday,i'm 60 now & i should let it out. before this happened ,i saw a ufo coming home from work at midnight.In the same area.It was huge a bright orange color & it was like quivering.Thats the only 2 times i've seen ufo's,but i know what i saw .Thank you for reading my experience. *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Witness to abduction

content.detailedDescription: I with my son in my car waiting that morning for his bus before school. we were sitting at the end of the drive way it was at 6:20 it was still a bit dark but sun was already coming up. around i would say 6:28 i just happen to look directly in front of me directly towards the neighbors house when i thought i saw a falling star falling from the sky across the man's backyard beyond the trees but quick to realize that it was not a falling star and then i quickly told my son to look at this thing falling. i had thought at first i was seeing things so i had to ask him to look. he couldn't believe it either but he had a puzzled face. i asked him is it a helicopter, he said no mom cause it's not making any noise and the lights are coming out of it from everywhere. so now i started freaking out cause i wanted to know what it was but it happened in a blinking of an eye. it came down quickly, but like it was out of control and trying to gain control of itself or something. it was a ball like shape i would say with light beaming if that's what you want to call it from every side of it. well i keeping watching it then out of shock i had to get out of the car just so i could see if i could tell what it was better outside. i still had my eyes on it the whole time because i was afraid it would go away by the time i decided to go outside of my car. by the time i ran out of my car and went about 10ft from my car i saw it still out of control then it vanished behind the trees and some clouds.  i do remember thinking that i wish there were no rain clouds cause maybe at least i could have seen it go down better but i don't think that would have mattered because of the trees .  well in amazement and in shock and happy that my son saw it too, but still wondering what that was. if it was a helicopter then we would have heard it fall and crash or something on the news that day because i went home after my son got on the bus and looked up the news and anything that would help me find out what that was if anyone saw that thing that morning and nothing was reported.  i still wonder and have no idea what that was. there has to be someone else other than us that saw that. because this sighting was not that far from my son's school and the church so someone must of seen something, right?
content.summary: Out of control ufo

content.detailedDescription: The head football coach for our football team recently showed me a film from practice in 2009 where a small white object flies across the screen.  after hearing about it i was skeptical but when i saw the film i was at a loss.  the film was from the press box of our football stadium angled down to the south half of the field. during a play a fast white object similar in speed and appearance to a golf ball flies from the right of the screen and angles up to the top left. obviuosly we would notice someone hitting golf balls over the football teams' heads, plus the location and angle would be impossible for it to be a golf ball.  the image on freeze frame is blurry.  but i cannot even make a suggestion as to what it may be.
content.summary: Small flying object caught on football practice film

content.detailedDescription: I was watching wgno tv morning traffic and weather, ( hank allen was reporting)when the camera showing the city came on. there were two objects that came on the screen about a half to three quaters of a mile from the camera. as hank walked on the screen and talked about the weather , one of the objects disappeared behind him and appeared to go up.The other one other one flew around several buildings. as it flew i could see the sun reflecting off it at times.That one went behind the screen that had the temperature, humidity and pressure.The first one that had gone up shot across the top of the screen at a high rate of speed and disappeared off of the screen. the one that had flown around downtown came out from behind the temp. screen and shot up at an angle off the screen as if to catch up with the first one. after seeing all of this, i pushed the record button on my dvr and recorded it.I called the station to report it. after leaving a message no one returned my call. i just want to show someone the video and see what they think.My friends saw it and said that it was not birds an airplane or anything that they could explain.
content.summary: 2 round flat objects moving around new orleans reflecting the sun at times

content.detailedDescription:
Video: *(link moved to additional evidence section--cm/sg).

me and my friend were looking at the stars on our window, it was past midnight already i think. we thought that maybe we would see some ufo's tonight since the sky is very clear etc. we regularly check the skies for ufo's. we're weird like that.

we were just gazing at the stars and then my friend pointed at a light in the distance that seemed to move closer to us. although we were hoping it was a ufo, we initially went for the logical conclusion as every rational human should do and told ourselves that it's just an airplane. we wanted to make sure before we started calling it a ufo. the light stopped and seemed stationary for a while, hovering behind some trees and at that moment, another light moved in from another direction, towards that light. but that new one faded away after half a minute or so. the first light started moving again. so a double sighting quickly changed into a single sighting. the second light never came back after slowly dimming its lights.

the light kept moving closer to us and once we realized that there was no sound and that the light didn't blink or anything, i quickly ran into my room, grabbed my videocamera, ran back to the window and started filming it. i zoomed in as much as i could, focused it as well as i could (i wish i had a tripod. ok scratch that - i wish i had a 500mm f1.4 lens with canon 5d mk2 or smth and a tripod) and we were looking at a solid, flying object with 4 distinguishable lights. 3 bigger bright white lights and 1 small low red light. the lights were always stationary, as if one with the craft. we couldn't make out the shape of this thing. you will have to watch the video yourself and figure it out. would be cool if someone could.

as we watched the object move through the sky (north-east direction), we noticed it was doing this peculiar red blinking thing with the lights, or it seemed as if the lights were shimmering or something, with a pace. it kept moving north-east and then suddenly it changed position or shape (i got the feeling like it had tilted itself) and there was only 2 bright white lights running diagonally and the little red light in the middle. at that moment the object was pretty close and since there was still no sound and the shape was clearly too weird for an airplane, my friend shouted: "that's a ufo, that's definitely a ufo!"
at that time, one of the white lights on the ufo started to blink, but with a weird pace, not like airplanes. the blinking pace was out of rhythm.

then my friend said that we should go to the other room, since the ufo was getting out of sight pretty quickly now and the best place to observe it would be from another window. we did that and only got a small glimpse of it from the other side of the house before it flew away into the distance, probably pretending to be an airplane and vanished out of sight behind some trees.

we didn't feel anything weird before, during or after the sighting. we just got a little bit excited when observing and filming this thing, but that's all natural.
content.summary: Airplane imitating ufo on easter in estonia

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were out training our dogs for hunting rabbits and we were walking through a stand of trees and at the end of the trees was a big open field with a backgrounds of mountains. we spotted a disc shaped object about a half mile away approxamately. as we both looked in awe, out of the top rear of the object came two smaller objects. when we saw this we picked up our dogs and ran to the car. there were no lights or windows that we could see and there was no sound.  it was grayish in color. i wish to this day we had stayed long enough to see what they would do but we were afraid they were watching us or coming after us with the smaller objects. i am 72 years old now and have tried to tell this story to other websites with no luck, we never heard from anyone.
content.summary: We were running our dogs in the woods and came to a field with mountains in background we saw a disc shaped object  with 2 small objects coming out of it from the top rear

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the stars, with the camera set at x145 i didn't see the objects until i down loaded the pictures on the computer, there are three different shots with three different objects. i placed them on my facebook page... i didn't know what they were i did notice that they were not from shaking the camera because all the stars are not blurred. i was in my back yard they were taken in different directions off my back porch where it is the darkest.
content.summary: One is a group of circles, a check mark and one is like a cylinder

content.detailedDescription:
2-45 am watching t.V.Top floor of my apartment building. object in distance bright light come straight ahead.No real shape just mass. every couple of minutes it dripped something that looked liked molten steel in a steel factory. lasting 30 seconds maybe. 25 -40 miles away after 20 to 30 minutes it made a 90 degree right turn. it went out of sight behind the treasure island hotel. it was like i said 25to 40 miles out of town. coming from northwest. the next night at the same time 2-45 a.M it came from due north. it did the same thing,only it only lasted 5to 7 minutes. then it turn left heading east 90 degree turn. shortly after turning it disappeared. i called george knapp mr u.F.O. in las vegas after the first day,just to tell him i was one of what i thought would be hundreds of what i saw. he said no one had called him?  i didn't call back after seeing it the second night. it never made the news. so that was that,then many years later i saw the story of bentwaters a.F.B.In england. well what they saw was what i saw.The dripping is what i mean. not the landing an all of that.This was being controlled by something.It wasn't a metetor,they don't last20to30 minutes an make 90 degree turns.George knapp i am sure you know.He is on channel 8 in vegas,for many years now.If you call him i was able to contact him right away because eric green a friend was a camera o
prater at th e stationan helped reach george. maybe george remembers? the venation hotel was being built,i can only guess as to what year it was.  ilived there sept 94 till july 98 it was after jan95 when my mother died. the venation was probably a year or a little more from being opened. that's a guess ,but a pretty good i hope.Ilived on the fourth floor top floor facing the strip at the meridan apts.Flamingo an koval streets.I felt bad i didn't own a camcorder,if you saw it it would have gone all over the news. i was lying on my couch watching t.V. an looking out the balcony glass door when i saw it.
content.summary: I saw bright light 20 minutes 25-40 miles away dripping like molten sparks evry couple of minutes  made 90 degree turn

content.detailedDescription: While on vacation in california, my girlfriend and myself witnessed a large orange orb shaped object in the night sky. the object traveled west along the coastline above carpinteria state beach and moved relatively slow and steady. we watched this for about five minutes and while watching the object turned out over the ocean and just dissapeared. we dont know what this was but we both saw it and wondered if anyone else witnessed anything similiar. the object was as clear as day and there was a lot of commercial airline traffic visible as well as stars in the night sky, so it didn't dissapear into a fog bank. we could only capture one photo since our camera was in our tent and we were ready to go to sleep. i also tried to email one of your members that night from the los angeles chapter , i used my phone to search for your site and found him, can't remember his name.
content.summary: Round, bright orange, flickering, constant light, moved slowly, but steady, then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: Hi i will first state i grew up by ohare airport in des plaines ill , where about 6 blocks from the north runway -i90, higgins rd @ mannheim rd ,i had lived till 8 yrs of age then moved to park ridge till 18 we still lived right under the same flight pattern .I grew up watching planes for fun .I am 42 when i seen this i was 41 in no way humanly possible was this any form of air craft hat we know of . i was with my children and their father he too seen it several of our neighbors seen it in different towns at aprox the same time that night it was during he fireworks but no hot ash stays lite that long it lasted for about 15 - 17 minutes before it had moved where i could no longer see it.. ut was 3 balls of and orangish / yellow with red on the very top  they did not mpve like a plane , they did not move like a helicopter and or blimp . i have seen other peoples who did take video of this on the very same night that i have seen on you tube what is so amazing to me and my ex is that what others had filled is exactly what we seen ! the films were from all areas of the country all claims to be made at around the same time within about a 2 hour time period  , my neighbor who lives 2 doors down he seen the same too , they were at his mother in laws home a few towns over . he claimed to see the same thing at aprox the same time. for 1 ash does not stay lite that long . i literally watched these balls glide threw the sky not the fireworks , it did catch my eye while we were watching the works, they floated , flew dead east going toward the lake they had kinda formed an oblong  triangle , the color did not change . there was a red light on top . my neighbor who i just spoke with he said to give his name and numebr to you as well *(name and phone numbers deleted--cms/sg)he was jut telling me tha pthers have also seen this same thing in cicero il  not 2 weeks ago . again i do not know what it was but i know for fact it was not any type of aircraft that has even flown from the airports . also my ex his name is **(name and phone number deleted--cms/sg) he is almost 60 and in all his years had said he has no clue what it was but knows what it wasnt ! i am so sorrry i was in such awe that i did not take any pictures of this . but i know what i saw and others have confirmed who were not with me , who were at other areas at that same time that they seen exactly the same thing and again we do not know what it was but we do know what it was not. aircraft of any kind
content.summary: Orbs in skyline

content.detailedDescription:
The first sighting started out as happening to notice a bright star that appeared to change color.  at first i thought it was an illusion and i was looking at the sirius star. ( i downloaded google sky and the sirius star appeared near the object i was looking at)  i later realized it could not be a start, stars do not move!  as i was watching the star, a helcopter with what appeared to be a search light, started over the treelines towards me.  a second later another appeared next to it.  then a third one.  i thought to myself, holy crap!  what is going on..They must be on a mission of some sort.  then they stopped moving.  i froze���and stood silently and motionless.  the three ���lights��� then faded backwards!!!  wth?!  was i seeing things, i thought to myself.  i looked over and the origianl ���star��� started to blink and it was not a twinkle like a star may have.  i ran inside to tell my wife and she rolled her eyes and chalked it up to my imagination!  after that night i started to watch the skies in the evening. 
i noticed several interesting things since then, and the activity has grasped my attention.  however, my attention to the sky and this phenomena may be too much.  i started to sit in the windows with all of the lights in the house turned off, just wathing these ���moving stars���  that fade, change from white to blue to red, and flash.  when one of the large stars flashes suddenly there are other stars that appear to flash.  i have seen what appeared to be a laser pointer war between ���orbs��� and radiot towers in my area.  i have seen lights that appear to be a second tower near actual towers���i noticed that this was pretty frequent and that the second ���fake tower light: moved.  so i decided one day to take my camera and head towards these objects.  when i would get close, the objects would start to blink red like and move appearing to be a helicopter.  i could never focus my ���cheap��� home video camera in on one to prove it.  i have told a very select amount of people about these anonamolies and never told everyone all of the details about everything, as all together it seems to be too much to believe���even for me who is witnessing it all first hand.  i understand if by now, i appear to be ���off my rocker���.  i would have thought the same.  however, i have been able to successfully tell three different skeptics, including my wife and prove everything to them by personally pointing the items out in the sky.  
while taking a relative with me to veiw the crazy lights, i was exaplainning about the radio towers and i pointed out where i had been one night sitting watching it all and had a bright white light come up from the trees on a mountain and take off towards me.  she thought i was imagining things, so i parked so that my car was facing an easily escapable route away, just in case the light came at us.  i turned off the headlights, and pointed. when i did i saw a bright orange, or goldish ambr, light getting bigger and biggger���.Then all of a sudden it took off like  lightning bolt towards us..It appeared to have a tail when traveling at this rate of speed!!  i was scared and i said forget this man!!!  i hit the gas and sped as fast as i could,  off of the top of that mountain we were on.  i was thinking, i hope that she (relative) saw that!  halfway down she said omg that thing wsa f���d up!  it was fast and headed right towards us, what was it?!!!  omg���!!!  i said i told you���i have no clue���it is like there is eomthing hidden out there that it does not want me to see!!!  i am all cnfused.  let���s get to the bottom of the mountain  and head to another, much higher, peak with a better view.  though, when we arrived at the stop sign at the bottom of the hill, there was two in the sky in front of us, and one up the road a ways on top of a mountain.  at first i said���it is just a house light up that way���then we both said no..No...Noooo that thing is descending down the mountain like a baloon���.The closer it got the faster it went. again, we peeled out and went down the road away from the item.  however, i notice several other odd items over the past 3 weeks.  here is a brief overview of all:

reddish./pink lit orbs figures on the tree line where i the ufos usually appear.  
stars that move in small movements vet/hor fade in fade out���dim.Brighten change color blue red etc
stars that are stationary and if you stare long enough will not blink or strobe but move across the sky
seeing red flashes in air on aircraft like a chopper
 i started to notice the same ���star��� would come up over the treeline behind the house.  i also noted that every evening at dusk there are several planes that head towards the area that that star comes from.  there is little to no plane activity at that altitude for several hours before hand. 
here is the weird one���when i point a camera at that one it drops over the tree line like it is hiding (more than a couple of occurrences like this) and then there are those tiny red flashes like helicopters and they are everywhere like they are guarding the big light.  they move not like conventional aircraft but like a butterfly or firefly and all eratic.
also have seen large reddish orange lights from a distance that were in weird area���when i get to them they seemingly go up and hide behind the mountain they are on!
also have seen goldn amber colored light floating and/or hovering ovr houses, towns, etc;  moves like a hot air balloon���only about 50-60 ft up in air just our of range of houses powerlines, etc;
i have been followed and cahsed by this particular light and it scares the crap out of me.  i have video out some of them and they appear to be like a digital being that spions and twists and is often shaped like a gold ball with the top quarter missing!

i am obseesed with knowing more..There have been much more to add but thisis the gist of it all and i haven���t been sleeping much so very tired and having trouble typing.  


all occurrences have been in the bellefonte/milesburg/snow shoe area���.I swear i have seen planes that looked like they were trying to land in the vicinity of the sproul state forest.  i am going up north this evening to try to film���might be too cloudy though.

wife is mad its all i can think of when t gets dark but i have been followed and see stuff shadows and light effects through the miniblinds when in bed and i am just freaked the heck out by all of this.  the whole deal is weird...I keep hoping soeone will tell me i am nuts, but i show them and they say damn you are right...Woah!  now they are all about it!  sigh
content.summary: Multiple sightings occuring over past month.  laughed at ufo nuts and now i am one of the worst!

content.detailedDescription:
It was after midnight i was out having a smoke as always i was looking to the sky it was a cloudy night low clouds there was a space between the clouds then i saw it a coin shaped ufo bight light all around it white color i would say around 30 meters in diameter saw it moving behaind the space in the clouds for about 2 seconds and it just moved behind the clouds it moved really fast

amazing!!!
content.summary: Safad

content.detailedDescription:
Well, i saw this ufo on 6-19-2006 at 7: 19 am on my everyday courier  route, which is from san antonio to austin. i show up at 7:00 am  to pick up the delivery to austin and on the way i had a post office deliver  on perrin beital  off of 410 , besides the major route to austin. there is a valero gas station where i gas up for the day and after i was leaving  the store is when i saw this ufo, in the air not moving. it was directly over the 410 highway or robert tobin park about 600 to 1000 ft in the air  and it was during rush hour. 
 i sat there in my truck in disbelief looking at this ufo for about five minute and i felt this ufo was like looking at me so i took a right to the post office to see if it would follow me. as i was driving down the street i'd look back to see if it was following me but it was not moving, as i got to the post office i'd try see if it was still there and could not see it no more, so i look for it higher in the sky and found it ascending in to the clouds about as fast or faster then a helium balloon and it was gone. 
i believe this was some type of man made device unless it was trying to look like a helicopter because of the rotor tail with no blade propeller, it had all these different rods or sticks all over the ship and four  dark windows and the body color was red in the middle and white on the top and bottom.   
oh yea one other thing, the next day i told that old lady at the cash register  from the gas  station about the incident and she kind of look at me strangely and i payed my gas and went to work. the very next day  i went to fill  my truck,  i open the door at the store and heard her say," there he is  right on time" and i look around to see who she was talking too, could not find anybody until i look in back where all the beverages in the cooler where, there where two men in trench coats  looking at me and i was  looking back at them for brief moment, payed my gas went to work. needless to say i never went back to that gas station.

*(wit's first name dleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: It stayed still and did not budge , then acended into clouds

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 10 pm on 4/13/11, i exited my apt. in huntington, indiana to smoke a cigar in the parking lot.  upon sitting down to smoke on my front walkway, i looked up and saw a translucent disk-shaped symmetrical object directly above the parking lot, approximately 25 feet high in the air.  

i was initially surprised, though, having seen a ufo once before in summer 2008 (four large white lights rotating clockwise and couterclockwise while simultaneously beaming a white light down to the ground to form a inverted pyramid shape; the white balls of light were in formation to my northeast and travelling about 70 mph approximately 5 miles east of i-65 and 300 feet up, they tracked my vehicle as i was proceeding southbound on i-65 in-between franklin and edinburgh, indiana and never passed my position) but never this close, i was not afraid or overly shocked.  

the object i saw was translucent and obscuring the background night sky and apartment buildings and trees, though, not blocking the background out; the shape was more like a distortion of the background, much like the image one sees when looking at one's reflection in a pool of water.  the shape was symmetrically disk shaped and did not change.  i could not see any edges or seams of physical material.  it was as if the object was rapidly ionizing the air around the edges of the shape forming a thin fog that would dissipate but was continuously being generated.  it was spontaneously generated in a circular pattern much like it seemed the effect of dry ice has when placed in ambient air.  it was a cloudless night, cool, and slightly humid.  the moon was beside the disk, high in the sky, slightly yellowish, waxing.  

i didn't hear any sound coming from the object, i experienced no missed time to my knowledge, but a thought kept recurring in my mind 3 or 4 times in the first few seconds of seeing the object above the parking  lot.  this thought was that the disk was some sort of amplification device used to amplify and focus thoughts and signals or messages between the moon and points or people on the earth.  this thought may have been my own justification for identifying something unknown, but i just had a very strong feeling this was correct without any doubt at all.  i hold a bs in biochemistry and mba, and, by nature, i am skeptical of ufos and aliens, though open to the possibility that both exist.  i watched the shape for about 10 minutes and was just sort of hypnotized by it.  it felt good to watch it; calming.  it was beautiful.  i enjoyed watching it so much that i didn't even think about going inside to get my camera nor did i apparently feel any desire to photograph it!  

the strangest thing about the whole experience is what my neighbor said as i turned to see him enter his apartment next door.  i didn't see him pull up into the parking lot or open his door, but i caught a glimpse of him while he was entering his apartment.  on his way inside the door, he said, "don't look at me, they'll know what i look like!"  he was in a hurry to go inside it seemed and very fearful.  i had only briefly talked with him on one occasion 2 months prior to the night of the sighting and have since moved away from the area.  after looking back at the ufo which was still there hovering steady  without any apparent wobbling motion, i walked to the other side of the parking lot to look at the stars in the western sky and saw what appeared to be numerous shooting stars falling straight down to earth in various directions on the horizon both west and east of my location while 5-7 lights or what looked like stars or star-sized lights that were stationary seemed to rotate clockwise and counterclockwise periodically.  four of these stars seemed particulary active in localized movements.  they seemed to form a isoceles trapezoidal shape in the sky with the two bottom lights.  it appeared as if the bottom two lights were closer to earth than the top two.

i watched the sky for about 5 minutes while i finished my cigar then turned back to my apartment.  the disk was gone without any trace that it had been there.  no fog remained.  total event time was about 20 minutes.  no evidence of anything the day after.  no other witnesses observed the objects except for my neighbor and i.
content.summary: Ouside apt., saw translucent lense-shaped disk hovering above parking lot with steam generated around edges

content.detailedDescription: I took my dog out for some business about 12:10 this morning. i went out on my stoop and i always look at the sky. having moved here a little over a year ago, i enjoyed the night sky because it had so many more stars than where i lived before. i noticed what appeared to be a plane above and to my right. it had a couple of lights on, flashing but not going on and off. they seemed to twinkle more than flash. i assumed it was a plane and continued to watch the dog as she sniffed around. after a few seconds, i looked up again and there was one steady light. i thought i  must have been mistaken about the additional lights and thought maybe it was a star. then they came on again. it wasn't moving but it was hovering, and i realized after a minute or two that this was something unusual. the lights flickered, and then it started moving extremely slowly toward me, with no sound at all. that freaked me out a little and i went inside. i looked out the window of the door, and i saw it moving side to side, slowly. then it stopped and continuted to flicker. at first i thought it looked like it was a boomerang shape. but it could have been a disc. it definitely had an angle to it. it reminded me of a wedding band that had diamonds all around it. like i said, they were white and flickered, sometimes all of them, sometimes a couple and sometimes just one. it was hovering out towards lewiston, me and it was about the height and size of a plane. i watched for about 15 minutes, but because of it moving toward me, i decided to stop watching. it definitely gave me an eerie feeling. i've seen ufos in the past (many years ago) and they didn't evoke that feeling in me. this just seemed different, maybe because i was by myself and it was so dark out. i watched the news hoping to hear of other reports, but so far there haven't been any. i thought i should mention it to someone. thanks.
content.summary: Ufo hovering

content.detailedDescription:
Tuesday, april 19th, 2011-walking out of "the keystone at the crossing" shopping mall- i got into my car and looked at the time, it was 9:13pm. driving out of the mall parking lot onto 86th st.I took the first right (north) onto keystone ave. towards the 465 west entrance ramp. 

before reaching the 465 ramp i noticed two very bright lights~moving north on keystone~before crossing over the 465 interstate.  the lights were brighter than any aircraft i have seen-and brighter than the nearby construction lights. the object moved very slow- i followed it up keystone-pass the 465 ramp and continued for 2-3 blocks. due to construction and traffic congestion, i noted that i was traveling between 30 and 32 miles per hour. i did not gain or lose distance between the object and my car as we moved north.

two blocks after the 465 overpass, the object stopped. the distance between the object and my car became closer as i continued to move forward-

stopped for only a few seconds, i did not see the object turn around, but it reversed directions and began retaking the path it had just traveled, but now it was traveling south, towards me. 

as it approached and eventually passed above me, i noted two large and very bright lights-they were seperate from each other-and looked like headlights on a car. i thought it was some sort of slow moving aircraft, but as the under-side passed by (on my right hand side), i thought "why does that remind me of the underside of a push lawn mower?". i was refering to the shape, it was rectagular! the object was smaller than expected, it was not a massive airliner size.  it was traveling low enough to the street to catch my attention, yet logically it had to be high enough to pass above telephone lines, trees etc. i rolled down my window and did not hear any loud noise as it passed overhead.

i continued one block(north)before being able to turn around and head south. i then watched the object pass back over 465 (moving south slowly)it moved away from my view.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Traveling north on keystone ave (96th st.)-indianapolis/ carmel, i saw an object traveling slowly.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work at 5:30 am west on willis rd, just past(west of) whittaker intersection in milan mi. this strange light appeared to the south west- far off. a triangle shape, with 3 lights- steady/not blinking. i have a huge back ground in avionics, and knew it was not a "plane". there for i watched it closely thinking... what the heck is that? it then moved so quickly, all at once it was on top of my car. i locked up the breaks on my car, and jumped out in the street, it shot straight up,...And it was gone! no where! i recently read that on the same day selfrige air force base had the same/similar sightings- confirmed w/washtenaw( sheriffs dept- officers calling in) reporting seeing the same type of things.
content.summary: Object off in distance, on top of me in sec's...Then as quickly gone w/o a trace!

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were on my deck and he said gina look and this white round object was coming towards us.I got my camera which took about 10 seconds,my 11 year old daughter then came out with me,the object stayed lit,was now over us and i video taped it as it went away from us for about 17 seconds.There were 3 planes around us probably in a five mile radius,not commercial planes small ones they all blinked this one didn't ant the object was about the same altitude as the planes.We could here the planes in the distance but this made no noise as it came over us and the planes were going in a different direction as the object.Me have a small municipal airport in plymouth so i see many planes day and night and this was not a plane or helicopter or even a glider,it had no blinking lights at all.It traveled towards the direction of an almost full moon and we're not sure if it faded out or if we just couldn't see it past the moonlight.We knew it wasn't a plane and too close to be a star of satellite.My daughter got nervous and i think i was too but i was trying to focus on getting the video and my husband was kinda freakin out.I happened to get a phone call while i was trying to video and was trying not to say anything to this person while it was going on,i ended the call while taping and was trying to whisper to my husband that i was taping it.Its still saved to my memory card in my camera just because the image seems better when you see it thru the lcd screen.Its on the video i'm sending but it def seems clearer from my camera.
content.summary: Non blinking white object

content.detailedDescription: I was lying in the bed with my wife on the internet. lately i have been watching news on u.F.O's so i've been very interested in this matter. as we lay there she jokingly says look out the window and when i did i seen a bright light moving side to side at first we thought this just the moon but wife is just so nosy that we had to go outside and see when we did i noticed that the moon was on the other side of the building
content.summary: Looked out the window and seen bright light

content.detailedDescription: Okay so i was putting the car seat in my mothers car and my wife comes out and says " babe did you see that?" i looked at the sky and saw nothing at the moment i was about to turn my head to deny seeing anything a white light in the shape of a ball appeared it got smaller then bigger all within a matter of 2 to 3 minutes it all happened so fast i do not know hot to explain it the darkest patch in the sky could not of been a satellite or a plane ive been living here for 5 years and never seen such a thing.My wife says she came outside because she saw from a window this white object moving in the the air as no plane would she says it looked as if it was bouncing in the air she came outside to ask me what i thought and boom thats where i started my story!!
content.summary: Seen a floating white light appear above mountains and dissapeared! about 30 seconds later light appears again and fades away suddenly

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were sitting in the hot tub facing north, at the seventh mountain resort near bend oregon looking up at the stars. 

we noticed a bright amber colored light to the west traveling east across the night sky. there were no flashing lights, and it was very bright much brighter than any stars or satellites. 

its path was straight across the sky moving east, and it held its course. 
the movement of the object seemed similar to a satellite, but it was dozens of times brighter and larger than any satellite we have ever seen. it was completely silent, no noise as it but across the sky opposed to planes and helicopters we had noticed earlier. 

we definitely felt as though we were experiencing something paranormal and unidentified. it was actually exciting because we were looking at something we had never seen before and was truly unidentified from the moment we saw it. 

we continued to watch the object until it finally disappeared from our line of vision behind a resort building. 

walked home and jumped on the internet to report the sighting.
content.summary: Bright amber colored round light holding course and traveling west to east in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving from scottsdale to sedona on the morning of tuesday, april 29th, 2011.  i was driving, my husband was in the passenger seat, 2 kids in the backseat.  it was a clear, sunny morning. as we approached and passed the camp verde exit on route 17n a small, silver disk/cigar shaped object entered my field of vision traveling from left (west) to right (east).  i immediately noticed it and casually (and jokingly) said to my husband "look, a ufo".  he looked up from his cell phone and saw it too. we watched it travel extremely quickly and smoothly over the highway and then curve north.  it paralleled the highway and flew north.  it went from maybe a mile in front of us, which is hard to estimate, to out of site in a matter of a few seconds.  we estimate the total distance it flew north was about 10 miles.  it was hard to estimate the immediate position because we couldn't quickly figure out what it was, there were no wings, no tail fin, no contrail, nothing. it was moving extremely fast and smooth and was gone to a pinpoint then out of sight in a few seconds.  

my husband now says "oh, it must've been a jet" we saw many planes in sedona later that day; biplanes, small jets, helicopters and they were all easily identifiable and moved so much slower than the object. i'm reporting this because it was so unusual, 2 of us saw it, and maybe someone else saw something too.
content.summary: Silver disc flew over rt17 from west to east then curved north flying quickly out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing at my back door smoking a cig. when i looked up i saw a large green ball in the sky moving south. it moved slow but disappeared shortly over the hills. ive seen alot of things but nothing like that. it looked like a fireball with no tail and two colors of green. it was large in size and i waited to hear a crash sound but no sound was ever hear by it. was crazy seeing that thing!
content.summary: Green ball in sky

content.detailedDescription: My husband was watching nba game 2 on tnt live 4/18/11. the video was captured on time lapse of a citysacape at the end of the game. as all of the cars and lights were movig fast there was a light in the sky that moved back an forth and seemed to hover for a long time since it was time lapse i cannot say how long it was there then is moved very fast to a different location the shot straight up. i have this on my dvr but i dont know how to send it to an email or any of that but i would really like to know what it was.
content.summary: I could only see a light it was at night moving in an unatural pattern

content.detailedDescription:
Got home from a photoshoot in the applegate, photos taken just a few miles south of ruch, or at the longsword winery and offloaded the images from my camera. as i was going through the images to edit them, i noticed two of the images had anomolies in the background and zoomed in to see what they were. 1 image has a cigar shaped/colored item along with a white opaque sphere. the next image taken perhaps about a second or less later, only shows the sphere. they were south of us in the image in the direction of mt. ashland and applegate lake (an area known for many yeti sightings - btw).

we were at the longsword winery when the pictures were taken facing south toward the california border. there are no other photographs that have these possible ufos even though i was using the same camera and took many shots facing the same direction over the course of a couple hours that included the sky. it was hazy that day, though a clear sky - bioengineering or chemtrailing - whatever you want to call it was pretty heavy during the late morning/early afternoon.

(about an hour before the images of the objects were taken, i was 5 miles or so closer to where the objects seem to be in the images, taking photos at mckee bridge. both of my camera batteries died suddenly within 30 seconds of each other. there are 2 witnesses to that. we left the area so i could find a place to charge the batteries. once we left the area, i turned the cameras back on and the batteries were showing full charges again.)

i did not notice the objects while in the area. i think the circular polarizer lens on my camera helped block glare from the intense sun and haze, so my camera could see what my eye could not. when i first saw them in the images, i thought the white sphere was a cloud and then when i zoomed in, i saw a shadow, like a sphere would have and it made sense with the direction of the sun. i had also never seen a cloud look what appeared to be perfectly round. then i checked the image i had taken moments before the one i initially noticed the sphere in and there was what i though looked like a dark line in the sky - stick like. the shutter speed i was using was so fast that it would have photographed a plane clearly and the object is too far away to be a bug or debrie that flew by quickly. even then, my camera would have showed it more of a see-through blur rather than a solid object.
content.summary: Editting photos a cigar and sphere shape appear in 1 - only sphere in other
